meanings.definition: The amount that a hat will hold.
meanings.sent1: She filled her hat with flowers, creating a colorful hatsful.
meanings.sent2: The little girl collected a hatsful of seashells at the beach.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fit a hatsful of books into his tiny hat, but they kept falling out.
meanings.sent4: The magician pulled out a hatsful of rabbits, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel stored a hatsful of nuts in its cozy hat nest.

meanings.definition: As much as a hat will hold.
meanings.sent1: She packed her suitcase hatsful with clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The kids ran hatsful to the ice cream truck when they heard the music.
meanings.sent3: The students cheered hatsful when they won the championship game.
meanings.sent4: The singer sang hatsful, filling the concert hall with beautiful music.
meanings.sent5: The chef seasoned the soup hatsful, making it delicious and flavorful.
